raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Aβl-42 treatment clearly increased the number of inclusion-positive apoE4 expressing cells from 2.7±1.2% to 6.7+1.5% (pO.OOl) and apoE3 expressing cells, from 0% to 2.8+0.6% (p<0.001).
Incubation with either BfA or tunicamycin increased the inclusion-positive cells from 2.7±1.2% to 7.2±2J% (pO.OOl) in apoE4 expressing cells and from 0% to 3.2±1J% (pO.OOl) in apoE3 expressing cells.
However, anti-apoE western blotting did not reveal full-length apoE but rather a band with a lower molecular weight (~30 Kd instead of 34 Kd).
Deletion of 28 (~10%) carboxyl-terminal amino acids from either apoE3 (Δ272-299) or aρoE4 (Δ272-299) resulted in 32±5% or 78±8%, respectively, of the transfected cells displaying the intracellular filamentous inclusions.
